text: The Incredibles is a 2004 video game based on the 2004 animated movie of the same name. It was released for the Game Boy Advance, Nintendo GameCube, PlayStation 2 and Xbox. It had Samuel L. Jackson and Jason Lee returning as the voices of Frozone and Buddy Pine. ==Gameplay== For Mr. Incredible's levels, he can attack enemies and lift objects. For Dash's levels, he can race in an obstacle course. ==Plot== Unlike the movie, the game ends with just the Incredibles defeating the Omnidroid. ==Reception== The game had good reviews. title: The Incredibles (video game)
